description: This file defines the index route for a Remix app. It sets page metadata and redirects to the '/notes' route.

methods.name: meta
methods.description: Provides metadata for the page, such as title and description.

methods.name: loader
methods.description: Asynchronous function that redirects to the '/notes' route.

methods.name: Index
methods.description: React component for the index route that renders nothing.
